TENEO_ENGINE_URL.description: Please input your Teneo Engine URL. https://some.engine/instance/

CLOSE_TIE_SESSION_ON_EXIT.description: If set to true, the Teneo Engine session will be ended when the chat UI is closed.

HEADER_TITLE.description: Title shown in the header of the chat window. If empty 'Teneo Web Chat' is used.

HEADER_ICON_URL.description: Can be used to specify a custom icon (with a size of 24x24 pixels) shown in the header. If empty a default icon is used.
